text:
Question 33) The same company can have their administrative headquarters where taxes are smaller, the production units where wages are the lowest, the capitals where interest are the highest and their executives living where the quality of life is higher .
SEVCENKO, N. The race for the 21st century: in the Russian mountain loop. In the text are presented business strategies in the context of globalization. A social consequence derived from these strategies has been
A) The growth of the tax burden.
B) the increase in occupational mobility.
C) the reduction of competitiveness between companies.
D) the direction of sales to the regional markets.
E) the expansion of the planning power of national states.
